import Mathlib
open scoped Classical
open Filter Function Nat FormalMultilinearSeries EMetric Set
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and c ‚àà ‚ÑÇ. Then { z ‚àà U : f(z) = c } is a discrete set. Furthermore, if p ‚àà U and f(p) = c, then there exists Œ¥ > 0 and a holomorphic g : Œî_Œ¥(p) ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ such that g is not identically zero, f(z)-c = {(z-p)}^k g(z) , \qquad for all z ‚àà Œî_Œ¥(p) , and g(p) ‚â† 0, where k ‚àà ‚Ñï is fixed.

Save it to: jirilebl_ca_ca_4834.lean -/
theorem discrete_level_set_aux_c {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U) {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U)
    {c : ‚ÑÇ} : IsDiscrete { z ‚àà U | f z = c } := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open scoped Classical
open Filter Function Nat EMetric Set
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and c ‚àà ‚ÑÇ. Then the zeros of f - c are isolated:
for every p ‚àà U with f p = c there exists Œ¥ > 0 such that in U ‚à© ball p Œ¥ the only zero is p.
Moreover, locally around p we can factor f(z) - c = (z - p) ^ k * g(z) with k : ‚Ñï and g holomorphic on the ball and g p ‚â† 0. -/
theorem zeros_are_isolated_and_local_factor {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U) {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U)
  {c : ‚ÑÇ} :
  (‚àÄ p, p ‚àà U ‚Üí f p = c ‚Üí ‚àÉ Œ¥ > 0, ‚àÄ z, z ‚àà U ‚à© ball p Œ¥ ‚Üí z ‚â† p ‚Üí f z ‚â† c)
  ‚àß (‚àÄ p, p ‚àà U ‚Üí f p = c ‚Üí ‚àÉ (Œ¥ : ‚Ñù) (k : ‚Ñï) (g : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), 0 < Œ¥ ‚àß
       DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ g (ball p Œ¥) ‚àß (‚àÄ z ‚àà ball p Œ¥, f z - c = (z - p) ^ k * g z) ‚àß g p ‚â† 0) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open scoped Classical
open Filter Function Nat Set
open scoped Topology

/-- Suppose U ‚äÇ ‚ÑÇ is open, f : U ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ is holomorphic, and c ‚àà ‚ÑÇ. Then the zeros of f - c are isolated:
for every p ‚àà U with f p = c there exists Œ¥ > 0 such that in U ‚à© Metric.ball p Œ¥ the only zero is p.
Moreover, locally around p we can factor f(z) - c = (z - p) ^ k * g(z) with k : ‚Ñï and g holomorphic on the ball and g p ‚â† 0. -/
theorem zeros_are_isolated_and_local_factor {U : Set ‚ÑÇ} (hU : IsOpen U) {f : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ} (hf : DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ f U)
  {c : ‚ÑÇ} :
  (‚àÄ p, p ‚àà U ‚Üí f p = c ‚Üí ‚àÉ Œ¥ > 0, ‚àÄ z, z ‚àà U ‚à© Metric.ball p Œ¥ ‚Üí z ‚â† p ‚Üí f z ‚â† c)
  ‚àß (‚àÄ p, p ‚àà U ‚Üí f p = c ‚Üí ‚àÉ (Œ¥ : ‚Ñù) (k : ‚Ñï) (g : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), 0 < Œ¥ ‚àß
       DifferentiableOn ‚ÑÇ g (Metric.ball p Œ¥) ‚àß (‚àÄ z ‚àà Metric.ball p Œ¥, f z - c = (z - p) ^ k * g z) ‚àß g p ‚â† 0) := by sorry
